attributes.action: Do not ban XL bullies or XL bullies type breeds
attributes.additional_details: Many of these types of dogs are family pets, very loyal and calm natured. Every day many different breeds attack people or have bitten, but they don't make the news. The XL bully hasn't been bred to be aggressive. By banning this breed/type, many peoples family pets will be wrongly taken away from the people the dogs devote on. Why not make people more aware of respecting dogs and how to train dogs as apposed to just banning them first. It is down to the owners and backyard breeding.
attributes.background: To not ban this breed/breed type due to the latest news on the breeds with attacks. It is down to the owners not the breed. If anything start by stopping backyard breeding.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
